Posts.Content: Hi , I'm due to start taking them too. But have decided to start after my radiotherapy has finished , give my body chance to deal with one thing at a time . I was hoping to come on this site and read a few more positives from some other Anastrozole patients. Anyway I will remain hopeful when I start taking them in 6 weeks time , but am grateful for any positive advice for coping . Love to all in this unusual club of ladies
Posts.Title: Anastrozole/Letrozole & Joint Pain

Posts.Content: Hi , just finished 15 sessions, didn’t use R1&2, but bought radiance cream off the Internet £20. Used aveeno also & had no problems.  Not worth all the stress with your GP , we all have enough to be worrying about. Good luck , hope it goes well. ((( )))
Posts.Title: R1 R2 for radiotherapy
